title: [重開][JUPAS][HKUST商科] 科大BBA/BSc 之你地問我地答 (2)

replies.msg:
[HKUST商科] 科大BBA/BSc 之你地問我地答

如果大家對ust 商科有咩問題，都可以係下面留言問下
問之前最好睇左FAQ 先



FAQ:
1. 科大商學院(HKUST SBM) 有咩major (2019 Fall onwards)?
由2019-2020 學年開始, SBM自己會有8個 BBA major 以及 2個BSc major 包恬:

另外仲會有多個IPO / Joint-School Programs:
http://undergrad.bm.ust.hk/academics/academic-programs/major-programs
(* RMBI 由2019 Fall 開始由SBM 管理, 列為SBM-SSCI JS program)

2. 經JUPAS 入UST SBM 有分School Based Admission(SBA) 同埋Program Based Admission (PBA)，有咩分別？
今年(2019) JUPAS 大家會留意到有一個叫JS5300 Business and Management (School-based admission) 嘅 option, 如果大家經JS5300 入UST, 大家入黎嘅時候唔會有major。SBA 學生會係Year 1完左之後 / Year 2 Fall Semester 完左之後揀佢地嘅First Major。

如果你係經PBA 入黎，例如JS5318 BBA Professional Accounting，咁你入黎嘅時候就會有BBA(ACCT) 作為你嘅First Major。

3. 經PBA 入學可唔可以再揀過/轉Major?
可以。所有SBM 學生都可以係 Year 1完左之後 / Year 2 Fall Semester 完左之後重新揀過Major 包括 GBUS, QFIN, ECOF etc.

4. DSE 幾多分先夠入邊個邊個 Program / Major?
Past Statistics: https://join.ust.hk/admissions/jupas/
JUPAS Score Calculator: https://join.ust.hk/jupas-score

5. 可唔可以Double Major?
係UST SBM，Double Major 係非常Common。多數學生都會有第二主修。大部分學生都會係Year 2 Spring 完左之後揀佢地嘅Second Major。

6. BBA Major 同 BSc Major 有咩分別?
Generally and supposedly, BBA major 嘅內容係比較少計數/量化(quantitative)，而BSc 嘅program 會比較注重quantitative 同mathematical training。 另外BSc major 會讀少幾個Business Core Courses

7. BBA(Economics & Finance) [ECON&FINA] 同 BSc(Economics & Finance) [ECOF] 又有咩分別?
先講ECON 嘅部分, ECOF 會比BBA(ECON) 讀多幾個Econ Theory Course, 包括: 2個Micro Theory 同 2個Macro Theory, 內容上會比BBA(ECON) 深入好多，同埋會"use multivariable calculus rigorously" 而且ECOF 係要讀多最少一個數學course

FINA 方面 [ECON&FINA] 嘅學生係會比ECOF 讀多好多Finance 嘅course，所以如果你係對Finance 更有興趣，可能BBA(ECON&FINA) 會較為o岩你。

8. 出路如何?
每個major 嘅人出黎嘅opportunities 都好唔同，由Sell side 到Buy side, Accounting / Audit, Advisory, Consulting, Marketing, FMCG, 到政府，教書都有，想知details 可以係下面再問

9. 科大SBM Ranking 如何? (個人認為Ranking 未必能夠完全反映學生能力，而且大部分科大學生都係一笑置之，Proceed with Caution)
THE Business & Economics: (No. 22 in the World, No.1 in Hong Kong)
https://www.timeshighereducation.com/world-university-rankings/2019/subject-ranking/business-and-economics#!/page/0/length/25/locations/HK/sort_by/rank/sort_order/asc/cols/stats

QS Economics and Econometrics: (No. 24 in the World, No. 1 in Hong Kong)
https://www.topuniversities.com/university-rankings/university-subject-rankings/2019/economics-econometrics

THE Global Employability: (No. 16 in the World, No. 1 in Hong Kong)
https://www.timeshighereducation.com/student/best-universities/best-universities-graduate-jobs-global-university-employability-ranking

10. 聽講黎緊HKUST SBM 會有新Business Core ，係咩黎?
如果咁都知，你真係好勁 黎緊新入學嘅學生將會修讀2 個新Business Core Courses, 包括係 ISOM2020 Coding for Business 以及係ISOM2600 Introduction to Business Analytics 內容暫定係主要用Python.[/quote]

一黎係個環境，讀商科intern experience 同network 會變得好重要，你問多啲人/去過科大同啲學生傾計就會發現科大個環境會令你好努力地去improve 自己（因為啲人會覺得唔咁做嘅話會收皮）

第二係career support, 雖然唔知hku fbe support 係點，科大會不時有internship referral, 會有tailor-made interview prep / cv review

你都可以google search 下過去幾年兩個program 出黎嘅人工同employer list 再決定啦

因為兩個program 定位好唔同，要比較一般都會用ecof 黎比

ISOM2020 Coding for Business
ISOM2600 Introduction to Business Analytics

[HKUST商科] 科大BBA/BSc 之你地問我地答

如果大家對ust 商科有咩問題，都可以係下面留言問下
問之前最好睇左FAQ 先



FAQ:
1. 科大商學院(HKUST SBM) 有咩major (2019 Fall onwards)?
由2019-2020 學年開始, SBM自己會有8個 BBA major 以及 2個BSc major 包恬:

另外仲會有多個IPO / Joint-School Programs:
http://undergrad.bm.ust.hk/academics/academic-programs/major-programs
(* RMBI 由2019 Fall 開始由SBM 管理, 列為SBM-SSCI JS program)

2. 經JUPAS 入UST SBM 有分School Based Admission(SBA) 同埋Program Based Admission (PBA)，有咩分別？
今年(2019) JUPAS 大家會留意到有一個叫JS5300 Business and Management (School-based admission) 嘅 option, 如果大家經JS5300 入UST, 大家入黎嘅時候唔會有major。SBA 學生會係Year 1完左之後 / Year 2 Fall Semester 完左之後揀佢地嘅First Major。

如果你係經PBA 入黎，例如JS5318 BBA Professional Accounting，咁你入黎嘅時候就會有BBA(ACCT) 作為你嘅First Major。

3. 經PBA 入學可唔可以再揀過/轉Major?
可以。所有SBM 學生都可以係 Year 1完左之後 / Year 2 Fall Semester 完左之後重新揀過Major 包括 GBUS, QFIN, ECOF etc.

4. DSE 幾多分先夠入邊個邊個 Program / Major?
Past Statistics: https://join.ust.hk/admissions/jupas/
JUPAS Score Calculator: https://join.ust.hk/jupas-score

5. 可唔可以Double Major?
係UST SBM，Double Major 係非常Common。多數學生都會有第二主修。大部分學生都會係Year 2 Spring 完左之後揀佢地嘅Second Major。

6. BBA Major 同 BSc Major 有咩分別?
Generally and supposedly, BBA major 嘅內容係比較少計數/量化(quantitative)，而BSc 嘅program 會比較注重quantitative 同mathematical training。 另外BSc major 會讀少幾個Business Core Courses

7. BBA(Economics & Finance) [ECON&FINA] 同 BSc(Economics & Finance) [ECOF] 又有咩分別?
先講ECON 嘅部分, ECOF 會比BBA(ECON) 讀多幾個Econ Theory Course, 包括: 2個Micro Theory 同 2個Macro Theory, 內容上會比BBA(ECON) 深入好多，同埋會"use multivariable calculus rigorously" 而且ECOF 係要讀多最少一個數學course

FINA 方面 [ECON&FINA] 嘅學生係會比ECOF 讀多好多Finance 嘅course，所以如果你係對Finance 更有興趣，可能BBA(ECON&FINA) 會較為o岩你。

8. 出路如何?
每個major 嘅人出黎嘅opportunities 都好唔同，由Sell side 到Buy side, Accounting / Audit, Advisory, Consulting, Marketing, FMCG, 到政府，教書都有，想知details 可以係下面再問

9. 科大SBM Ranking 如何? (個人認為Ranking 未必能夠完全反映學生能力，而且大部分科大學生都係一笑置之，Proceed with Caution)
THE Business & Economics: (No. 22 in the World, No.1 in Hong Kong)
https://www.timeshighereducation.com/world-university-rankings/2019/subject-ranking/business-and-economics#!/page/0/length/25/locations/HK/sort_by/rank/sort_order/asc/cols/stats

QS Economics and Econometrics: (No. 24 in the World, No. 1 in Hong Kong)
https://www.topuniversities.com/university-rankings/university-subject-rankings/2019/economics-econometrics

THE Global Employability: (No. 16 in the World, No. 1 in Hong Kong)
https://www.timeshighereducation.com/student/best-universities/best-universities-graduate-jobs-global-university-employability-ranking

10. 聽講黎緊HKUST SBM 會有新Business Core ，係咩黎?
如果咁都知，你真係好勁 黎緊新入學嘅學生將會修讀2 個新Business Core Courses, 包括係 ISOM2020 Coding for Business 以及係ISOM2600 Introduction to Business Analytics 內容暫定係主要用Python.[/quote]

科大 Asia MIT

why career-wise ust
pg指post-graduate

一黎係個環境，讀商科intern experience 同network 會變得好重要，你問多啲人/去過科大同啲學生傾計就會發現科大個環境會令你好努力地去improve 自己（因為啲人會覺得唔咁做嘅話會收皮）

第二係career support, 雖然唔知hku fbe support 係點，科大會不時有internship referral, 會有tailor-made interview prep / cv review

你都可以google search 下過去幾年兩個program 出黎嘅人工同employer list 再決定啦

如果你係好肯定目標要讀qfin嘅話其實冇分別
因為即使你有major咁入，你想tran去讀qfin其實方法只係drop咗自己嗰major變成no major然後一樣同其他人一齊爆gpa揀

所以即使你有major咁入你想讀qfin你都要變返no major同其他no major公平競爭

有major入唯一好處就係假設你都係決定唔讀qfin你本身都有major可以唔洗擔驚受怕揀唔到major

所以如果分夠嘅咪有major入咗先，之後睇下讀一陣判斷下有冇能力chur gpa(qfin起碼3.5, normal 3.7)先再決定

希望幫到你
